Package us.teaminceptus.novaconomy.api.auction

Class AuctionProduct

java.lang.Object
us.teaminceptus.novaconomy.api.util.Product
us.teaminceptus.novaconomy.api.auction.AuctionProduct
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<Product>, ConfigurationSerializable
public final class AuctionProduct extends Product implements Serializable
Represents an item in the Novaconomy Auction House.
